properties.comment: Database maps for tables and fields "Select __VeryLargeAndDescriptiveFieldId__ From __tblVeryLargeAndDescriptiveTableName__ Where __VeryLargeAndDescriptiveFieldName__ = @@ValueName@@ And __VeryLargeAndDescriptiveFieldPassword__ = @@ValuePassword@@" => "Select Id From tblUsers Where Nam=@@ValueName@@ And Pass=@@ValuePassword@@"
